title: Vuelta a España stage 10: Sepp Kuss defends red jersey as Filippo Ganna proves untouchable
content:
Kuss delivers time trial of his career to retain GC lead, Evenepoel gains time on all other classification rivals, moves to 1:09 back overall.

Read the full article at Vuelta a España stage 10: Sepp Kuss defends red jersey as Filippo Ganna proves untouchable on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
